mapper.select: SELECT R.roleId, R.roleName, DATE_FORMAT(R.registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(R.modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate FROM oms_role R, oms_member M, oms_role_member_map RM WHERE M.memberId = RM.memberId AND R.roleId = RM.roleId AND M.memberId = #{memberId}
